sentences.text: Dear Shareowner:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is my pleasure to invite you to attend the 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareowners of Kellogg Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This year, the meeting will be held at 1:00 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Time on April 28, 2017 at the McCamly Plaza Hotel, 50 Capital Avenue SW, Battle Creek, Michigan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following pages contain the formal Notice of the Annual Meeting and the Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please review this material for information concerning the business to be conducted at the meeting and the nominees for election as Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are pleased to take advantage of the Securities and Exchange Commission rules that allow companies to furnish proxy materials to their shareowners on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe these rules allow us to provide our Shareowners with the information they need, while lowering the costs of delivery and reducing the environmental impact of our Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attendance at the Annual Meeting will be limited to Shareowners only.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please note that, if you plan to attend the meeting you must request an admission ticket in advance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can obtain an admission ticket by visiting www.proxyvote.com and following the instructions provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need the 16-digit control number included on your proxy card, voter instruction form, or notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can also request an admission ticket by e-mail at investor.relations@kellogg.com or by writing to Kellogg Company Shareowner Services, One Kellogg Square, Battle Creek, MI 49017-3534.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Written requests must be received by April 21, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Evidence of your stock ownership, which you may obtain from your bank, stockbroker, etc., must accompany your letter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Seating at the new annual meeting location is limited, and requests for tickets will be processed in the order in which they are received.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In any event, you must register on or prior to April 27, 2017 if you wish to attend the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any Shareowner needs special assistance at the meeting, please contact Shareowner Services at (269) 961-2800.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you plan to attend the meeting, I urge you to vote your shares as soon as possible.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote your shares via a toll-free telephone number or over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a paper copy of the proxy or voting instruction card by mail, you may sign, date and mail the card in the envelope provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: John Bryant  Chairman and Chief Executive Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March 8, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: KELLOGG COMPANY
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One Kellogg Square  Battle Creek, Michigan 49017-3534
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NOTICE OF THE ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREOWNERS  TO BE HELD APRIL 28, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TO OUR SHAREOWNERS:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareowners of Kellogg Company, a Delaware corporation, will be held at 1:00 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Time on April 28, 2017 at the McCamly Plaza Hotel, 50 Capital Avenue SW, Battle Creek, Michigan, for the following purposes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. To elect four Directors for a three-year term to expire at the 2020 Annual Meeting of Shareowners;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. To vote on an advisory resolution to approve executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. To hold an advisory vote on the frequency of holding an advisory vote on executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. To ratify the Audit Committees appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP for our 2017 fiscal year;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. To approve the Kellogg Company 2017 Long-Term Incentive Plan;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. To consider and act upon a Shareowner proposal to amend the proxy access bylaw, if properly presented at the meeting; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 7. To take action upon any other matters that may properly come before the meeting, or any adjournments thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only Shareowners of record at the close of business on March 1, 2017 will receive notice of and be entitled to vote at the meeting or any adjournments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We look forward to seeing you there.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Order of the Board of Directors,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Gary Pilnick Vice Chairman, Corporate Development and Chief Legal Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March 8, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR THE ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREOWNERS TO BE HELD ON FRIDAY, APRIL 28, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ABOUT THE MEETING
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Information About this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why You Received this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You have received these proxy materials because our Board of Directors, which we refer to as the Board, is soliciting your proxy to vote your shares at the 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareowners of Kellogg to be held at 1:00 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Time at the McCamly Plaza Hotel, 50 Capital Avenue SW, in Battle Creek, Michigan, on Friday, April 28, 2017, or any adjournments thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement includes information that we are required to provide to you under the rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission and that is designed to assist you in voting your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On March 8, 2017, we began to mail to our Shareowners of record as of the close of business on March 1, 2017, either a notice containing instructions on how to access this proxy statement and our annual report online or a printed copy of these proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you own our common stock in more than one account, such as individually and also jointly with your spouse, you may receive more than one notice or set of these proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To assist us in saving money and to serve you more efficiently, we encourage you to have all your accounts registered in the same name and address by contacting our transfer agent, Broadridge Corporate Issuer Solutions, Inc., P.O. Box 1342, Brentwood, NY 11717; phone number: (877) 910-5385 or e-mail: shareholder@broadridge.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of Electronic Availability of Proxy Statement and Annual Report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As permitted by Securities and Exchange Commission rules, we are making this proxy statement and our annual report available to our Shareowners electronically via the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The notice of electronic availability contains instructions on how to access this proxy statement and our annual report and vote online.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a notice by mail, you will not receive a printed copy of the proxy materials in the mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instead, the notice instructs you on how to access and review all of the important information contained in the proxy statement and annual report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The notice also instructs you on how you may submit your proxy over the Internet or by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a notice by mail and would like to receive a printed copy of our proxy materials, you should follow the instructions for requesting such materials contained on the notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Summary Processing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Securities and Exchange Commissions rules permit us to print an individuals multiple accounts on a single notice or set of annual meeting materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This printing method is referred to as summary processing and may result in cost savings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To take advantage of this opportunity, we have summarized on one notice or set of annual meeting materials all of the accounts registered with the same tax identification number or duplicate name and address, unless we received contrary instructions from the impacted Shareowner prior to the mailing date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We agree to deliver promptly, upon written or oral request, a separate copy of the notice or annual meeting materials, as requested, to any Shareowner to which a single copy of those documents was delivered.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you prefer to receive separate copies of the notice or annual meeting materials, contact Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. at (800) 542-1061 or in writing at Broadridge, Householding Department, 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood, New York 11717.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are currently a Shareowner sharing an address with another Shareowner and wish to receive only one copy of future notices or annual meeting materials for your household, please contact Broadridge at the above phone number or address.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who Can Vote  Record Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The record date for determining Shareowners entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting is March 1, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the approximately 350,050,725 shares of Kellogg common stock issued and outstanding on that date is entitled to one vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How to Vote  Proxy Instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a notice of electronic availability, you cannot vote your shares by filling out and returning the notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The notice, however, provides instructions on how to vote by Internet, by telephone or by requesting and returning a paper proxy card or voting instruction card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered directly in your name with our transfer agent, you are considered, with respect to those shares, the shareowner of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the shareowner of record, you have the right to vote in person at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in a brokerage account or by another nominee or trustee, you are considered the beneficial owner of shares held in street name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the beneficial owner, you are also invited to attend the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since a beneficial owner is not the shareowner of record, you may not vote these shares in person at the meeting unless you obtain a legal proxy from your broker, nominee or trustee that holds your shares, giving you the right to vote the shares at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether you hold shares directly as a registered shareowner of record or beneficially in street name, you may vote without attending the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote by granting a proxy or, for shares held beneficially in street name, by submitting voting instructions to your broker, nominee or trustee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In most cases, you will be able to do this by telephone, by using the Internet or by mail if you received a printed set of the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Telephone or Internet  You may submit your proxy by following the instructions provided in the notice of electronic availability, or if you received a printed version of the proxy materials by mail, by following the instructions provided with your proxy materials and on your proxy card or voting instruction card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The telephone and Internet voting procedures have been set up for your convenience and have been designed to authenticate your identity, to allow you to give voting instructions, and to confirm that those instructions have been recorded properly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The deadline for voting by telephone or via the Internet is 11:59 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Time on Thursday, April 27, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Mail  If you received printed proxy materials, you may submit your proxy by mail by signing your proxy card if your shares are registered or, for shares held beneficially in street name, by following the voting instructions included by your broker, nominee or trustee, and mailing it in the enclosed envelope.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you wish to vote using the proxy card, complete, sign, and date your proxy card and return it to us by April 27, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether you vote by telephone, over the Internet or by mail, you may specify: whether your shares should be voted for all, some or none of the nominees for Director (Proposal 1); whether you approve, disapprove, or abstain from voting on the advisory resolution to approve Kelloggs executive compensation (Proposal 2); whether you vote for advisory votes on executive compensation to occur every one, two or three years or abstain from voting (Proposal 3); whether you approve, disapprove, or abstain from voting on the proposal to ratify the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal year 2017 (Proposal 4); whether you approve, disapprove, or abstain from voting on the Kellogg Company 2017 Long-Term Incentive Plan (Proposal 5); and whether you approve, disapprove, or abstain from voting on the Shareowner proposal, if properly presented at the meeting (Proposal 6).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When a properly executed proxy is received, the shares represented thereby, including shares held under our Dividend Reinvestment Plan, will be voted by the persons named as the proxy according to each Shareowners directions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies will also be considered to be voting instructions to the applicable Trustee with respect to shares held in accounts under our Savings & Investment Plans and other applicable employee benefit plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the proxy is properly executed but you do not specify how you want to vote your shares on your proxy card or voting instruction card, or voting by telephone or over the Internet, we will vote them For the election of all nominees for Director as set forth under Proposal 1 - Election of Directors below, For Proposals 2, 4 and 5, One Year on Proposal 3, and Against Proposal 6, and otherwise at the discretion of the persons named in the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Revocation of Proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a shareowner of record, you may revoke your proxy at any time before it is exercised in any of three ways:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: by submitting written notice of revocation to our Secretary;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: by submitting another proxy by telephone, via the Internet or by mail that is later dated and, if by mail, that is properly signed; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: by voting in person at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in street name, you must contact your broker, nominee or trustee to revoke and vote your proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A quorum of Shareowners is necessary to hold a valid meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A quorum will exist if the holders representing a majority of the votes entitled to be cast by the Shareowners at the Annual Meeting are present, in person or by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non- votes and abstentions are counted as present at the Annual Meeting for purposes of determining whether a quorum exists.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A broker non-vote occurs when a nominee, such as a bank or broker, holding shares for a beneficial owner, does not vote on a particular proposal because the nominee does not have discretionary voting power for that particular item and has not received instructions from the beneficial owner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under current New York Stock Exchange rules, nominees would have discretionary voting power for ratification of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP (Proposal 4), but not for voting on the election of Directors (Proposal 1), the advisory resolution to approve Kelloggs executive compensation (Proposal 2), the advisory vote on the frequency of advisory votes on executive compensation (Proposal 3), the approval of the Kellogg Company 2017 Long-Term Incentive Plan (Proposal 5), or the Shareowner proposal (Proposal 6).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Required Vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has adopted a majority voting policy which applies to the election of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this policy, any nominee for Director who receives a greater number of votes withheld from his or her election than votes for such election is required to offer his or her resignation following certification of the Shareowner vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Boards Nominating and Governance Committee would then consider the offer of resignation and make a recommendation to our independent Directors as to the action to be taken with respect to the offer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This policy does not apply in contested elections.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For more information about this policy, see Corporate Governance  Majority Voting for Directors; Director Resignation Policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under Delaware law, a nominee who receives a plurality of the votes cast at the Annual Meeting will be elected as a Director (subject to the resignation policy described above).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The plurality standard means the nominees who receive the largest number of for votes cast are elected as Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thus, the number of shares not voted for the election of a nominee (and the number of withhold votes cast with respect to that nominee) will not affect the determination of whether that nominee has received the necessary votes for election under Delaware law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the number of withhold votes with respect to a nominee will affect whether our Director resignation policy will apply to that individual.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any nominee is unable or declines to serve, proxies will be voted for the balance of those named and for such person as shall be designated by the Board to replace any such nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Board does not anticipate that this will occur.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The option of one year, two years or three years that receives a majority of all the votes cast by Shareowners will be the frequency for the advisory vote on executive compensation (Proposal 3) that has been selected by Shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, in the event that no option under Proposal 3 receives a majority of the votes cast, we will consider the option that receives the most votes to be the option selected by Shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The affirmative vote of the holders representing a majority of the shares present and entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting is necessary to approve the advisory resolution on Kelloggs executive compensation (Proposal 2), to ratify the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal 2017 (Proposal 4), to approve the Kellogg Company 2017 Long Term Incentive Plan (Proposal 5) and to approve the Shareowner proposal (Proposal 6).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares present but not voted because of abstention will have the effect of a no vote on Proposals 2, 4, 5 and 6.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions will not impact the outcome on Proposal 3.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not provide your broker or other nominee with instructions on how to vote your street name shares, your broker or nominee will not be permitted to vote them on non-routine matters (a broker non-vote) such as Proposals 1, 2, 3, 5 and 6.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares subject to a broker non-vote will not be considered entitled to vote with respect to Proposals 1, 2, 3, 5 and 6, and will have no effect on the outcome of Proposals 1, 2, 3, 5 and 6.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please note that brokers may not vote your shares on the election of directors in the absence of your specific instructions as to how to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We encourage you to provide instructions to your broker regarding the voting of your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not intend to bring any business before the meeting other than that set forth in the Notice of the Annual Meeting and described in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if any other business should properly come before the meeting, the persons named in the proxy card intend to vote in accordance with their best judgment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: on such business and on any matters dealing with the conduct of the meeting pursuant to the discretionary authority granted in the proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Costs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We pay for the preparation and mailing of the Notice of the Annual Meeting and proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have also made arrangements with brokerage firms and other custodians, nominees, and fiduciaries for forwarding proxy-soliciting materials to the beneficial owners of the Kellogg common stock at our expense.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we have retained D.F. King & Co., Inc. to aid in the solicitation of proxies by mail, telephone, facsimile, e-mail and personal solicitation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For these services, we will pay D.F. King & Co.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Inc. a fee of $16,000, plus reasonable expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directions to Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To obtain directions to attend the Annual Meeting and vote in person, please contact Investor Relations at (269) 961-2800 or at investor.relations@kellogg.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

Kellogg Foundation (the Kellogg Foundation) and the trustees of the Kellogg Trust with respect to 68,374,190 shares of Kellogg Company, or 19.5% of our outstanding shares on December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of that date, the trustees of the Kellogg Trust were John Bryant, Fred Keller, La June Montgomery Tabron and The Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A. The Kellogg Foundation, a Michigan charitable corporation, is the sole beneficiary of the Kellogg Trust.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the agreement governing the Kellogg Trust (the Agreement), at least one trustee of the Kellogg Trust must be a member of the Kellogg Foundations Board, and one member of our Board must be a trustee of the Kellogg Trust.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Agreement provides if a majority of the trustees of the Kellogg Trust (which majority must include the corporate trustee) cannot agree on how to vote the Kellogg stock, the Kellogg Foundation has the power to direct the voting of such stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With certain limitations, the Agreement also provides that the Kellogg Foundation has the power to approve successor trustees, and to remove any trustee of the Kellogg Trust.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The shares of Kellogg Company owned directly by Mr. Bryant and Ms. Montgomery Tabron are reflected in the Officer and Director Stock Ownership table below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (2) According to a Schedule 13G/A filed with the SEC on February 3, 2017, The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation (BONYMC) has sole voting power for 5,374,203 shares, shared voting power for 68,403,225 shares (including those shares beneficially owned by the Kellogg Trust), sole investment power for 6,219,088 shares and shared investment power for 68,428,015 shares (including those shares beneficially owned by the Kellogg Trust).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: BONYMC, as parent holding company for The Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A., (BONY), as trustee of the Kellogg Trust, shares voting and investment power with the other three trustees with respect to the 68,374,190 shares owned by the Kellogg Trust, which shares are reflected in BONYMCs totals above.
